dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7600 IH: Traditional Screening Application Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Lesko (for herself, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mr. Cawthorn, Mr. Duncan, Mr. Gohmert, Mr. Steube, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Norman, Mr. Hice of Georgia, Mr. Budd, and Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To prohibit the Transportation Security Administration from using the X gender designation in the TSA PreCheck advanced security program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Traditional Screening Application Act or the TSA Act.

The Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration may not use the X gender designation in the TSA PreCheck advanced security program. The Administrator may permit applicants to and participants in such program to select from only Male or Female.
